summary.span: 提供容器供命令或控制項群組使用。

span.span: Provides a container for a group of commands or controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項提供一種溢位機制，將無法容納的項目到溢位區域。 controls provide an overflow mechanism that places items that do not fit on the into an overflow area. 只有在父系的工具列項目的可以移動或由使用者調整大小。Only toolbar elements within a parent can be moved or resized by the user. 是，這表示其標頭和物件的集合可以是任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板）。 is a , which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. ## 自訂工具列控制項Customizing the ToolBar Control 若要將相同的屬性設定套用至多個控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設，讓控制項的獨特的外觀。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱 < [ 透過建立 ControlTemplate 自訂現有控制項的外觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和狀態所特有，請參閱 < [ToolBar 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/toolbar-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ToolBar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/toolbar-styles-and-templates.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立內。The following example shows how to create a inside a . [!code-xaml[ToolBarExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolBarExample/CS/Pane1.xaml#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Band { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Band : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示工具列應該在 中的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates where the toolbar should be located in the .

value.span: 工具列所在處的 群組列。

span.span: The band of the in which the toolbar is positioned.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位置中的值而定， ，和屬性。The position of the in a depends on the values of the , , and properties. 當設定為，群組列表示中的資料列。When is set to , a band represents a row in the . 當已，群組列表示的資料行。When is , a band represents a column of the . 下表描述之間的關聯性， ，和。The following table describes the relationship between , , and . |方向Orientation|頻外Band|BandIndexBandIndex| |-----------------|----------|---------------| |水平Horizontal|表示在其中的資料列定位。Indicates the row in which the is positioned. 具有工具列設為較小的值都以上具有較大的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.|指出的位置上。Indicates the position of the on the . 具有工具列左邊具有較大的值是設為較小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.| |垂直Vertical|指出資料行定位。Indicates the column in which the is positioned. 具有工具列左邊具有較大的值是設為較小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.|指出的位置上。Indicates the position of the on the . 具有工具列設為較小的值都以上具有較大的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.| ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個屬性來放置內的控制項。The following example shows how use this property to place controls inside a . [!code-xaml[ToolBarExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolBarExample/CS/Pane1.xaml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您沒有明確設定此屬性，其值會由的順序中設定。If you do not explicitly set this property, its value is determined by the order in which the is set in the . 比方說，如果您將兩個工具列放在未設定並屬性、 值將會是 0，這兩個工具列。For example, if you put two toolbars in a without setting the and properties, the value of will be 0 for both toolbars. 值會第一個工具列的 0，1 表示第二個工具列。The value of will be 0 for the first toolbar and 1 for the second toolbar. 位置中的值而定， ，和屬性。The position of the in a depends on the values of the , , and properties. 當設定為，群組列表示中的資料列。When is set to , a band represents a row in the . 當已，群組列表示的資料行。When is , a band represents a column of the . 下表描述之間的關聯性， ，和。The following table describes the relationship between , , and . |方向Orientation|頻外Band|BandIndexBandIndex| |-----------------|----------|---------------| |水平Horizontal|表示在其中的資料列定位。Indicates the row in which the is positioned. 具有工具列設為較小的值都以上具有較大的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.|指出的位置上。Indicates the position of the on the . 具有工具列左邊具有較大的值是設為較小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.| |垂直Vertical|指出資料行定位。Indicates the column in which the is positioned. 具有工具列左邊具有較大的值是設為較小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.|指出的位置上。Indicates the position of the on the . 具有工具列設為較小的值都以上具有較大的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.| ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個屬性來放置內的控制項。The following example shows how use this property to place controls inside a . The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果超過它有空間，以顯示項目，它會將其餘的項目放在它的溢位區域。If a has more items than it has the space to show, it puts the remaining items in its overflow area. 使用者可以按一下箭號存取溢位項目。The user can click the arrow on the to access the overflow items. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是唯讀的附加的屬性。This property is a read-only attached property. 唯讀附加的屬性並不常見，而且無法直接[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用量。Read-only attached properties are uncommon, and have no direct [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage. 不過，您可以使用附加的屬性參考的屬性觸發程序在樣式中，若要將不同的樣式值套用至處於溢位面板的工具列中的項目。However, you can use the attached property reference as a property trigger in a style, to apply different style values to an item within a toolbar that is in the overflow panel. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 請參閱＜備註＞。See Remarks.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyDown(class System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnKeyDown (e As KeyEventArgs)

span.span: The arguments for the event.

summary.span: 提供 路由事件的類別處理，該事件發生於按下 中某項目上的按鍵時。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when a key is pressed on an item in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按下首頁中的第一個項目接收到鍵盤焦點。When the user presses HOME, the first item in the receives keyboard focus. 當使用者按結束時中的最後一個項目接收到鍵盤焦點。When the user presses END, the last item in the receives keyboard focus. 當發生這種情況時，此實作會將標示事件，為已處理，藉由設定屬性的事件資料，以`true`。When this occurs, this implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true`.

para.span: 如果您覆寫，務必呼叫基底實作，您實作。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 無法呼叫基底實作，可避免基底類別處理可能會變更執行階段行為的最後一個類別的類別處理常式的事件。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 您可以呼叫之前或之後，在特殊處理的基底實作，根據您的需求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 您可以呼叫之前或之後，在特殊處理的基底實作，根據您的需求。
